EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
BAY OF BISCAY.
DNC 08.
S/V ARIA DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN 45-44N 007-04W AT
201845Z AUG. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
MRCC ETEL, TELEX: 42950519, PHONE: 332 9755 3535,
FAX: 332 9755 4934, E-MAIL: ETEL@MRCCFR.EU.
